data.name: End War RTS - Alien invasion
data.detailed_description:
In order to compete for resources, human beings lead the world to the brink of collapse. An alien race takes the opportunity to attack human homes. Human beings unite to fight with aliens. Can human beings protect their homes?

Alien race, with strong technology and subversive strength

United human countries share science and technology, not in the United States, Russia, etc., to form a community of common destiny and human race

Alien invasion takes three kinds of minerals as resources, and expanding the base is also a necessary means

End War RTS - alien invasion is an extension expansion of the main game, a real-time strategy game
data.about_the_game:
In order to compete for resources, human beings lead the world to the brink of collapse. An alien race takes the opportunity to attack human homes. Human beings unite to fight with aliens. Can human beings protect their homes?

data.short_description: A pixel style RTS type of modern war game, with the theme of alien invasion, real-time strategy game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win7,Win10
  • Processor: I3 3.20GHZ
  • Graphics: Support Dx11 graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win7,win10
  • Processor: I7 8 Core 3.20GHZ
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
